localize.text: Shasha
...Do you copy.
Greetings. I'm Shasha, Chief of the Disciplinary Team of Branch O-5681.
Though you've already experienced it by now, Management procedures for Aberrations are somewhat similar, yet different.
As such, it's recommended that you put all employees through a thorough training process for Aberration Abnormalities. Do also check up on E.G.O equipment used by the employees.
Shasha out.
(Transmission terminated with branch O-5681)
Branch O-5681 not only has Aberrations, but also contains the Abnormalities' counterparts.
Though the death of the Manager in that branch was certainly unexpected, there's no need to question their abilities.
As such, I propose taking some employees from the O-5681 branch.
Question the request.
Allow.
It's for the prosperity of the company.
Placing employees in situations they are most suited to, which has gained me the title of the most advanced AI.
Though, it is amusing that I'm making such a claim in front of the Manager.
If you still doubt my decision, I'll make sure to get a communication system in place for the visitors.
Their previous Manager has failed, but I have no doubts you'll be able to make the most out of them.
Placing employees in situations they are most suited to, which has gained me the title of the most advanced AI.
Titled the most advanced AI, I'm here to assist you.
Though you may decline whenever you feel uncomfortable.
As always, the decision is up to you.
